thread.title: Jayaram honoured to performing at Chottanikkara
thread.title_full: Jayaram honoured to performing at Chottanikkara - The Times of India

author: Sanjith Sidhardhan
title: Jayaram honoured to performing at Chottanikkara
text:
Actor Jayaram's passion for playing the chenda at temples is no secret. He recently led close to 150 performers at the Chottanikkara temple, an honour he is proud of.
A music appreciation committee had also honoured the actor for his performance on Oct 18 at the temple premises.
Jayaram, who is just back from his US stage tour, has signed up two Malayalam movies and will appear in a salt-and-pepper look for his next role.
